```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Create Intial Tibble

```{r}
names <- tibble(names = c("Walter", "Nolan", "Michael", "Devon", "Helen", "Bea", "Onea", "Shelby", "Keegan", "Henry", "Sid", "Carol", "Julie", "Maren", "Garret", "Fiona"))

names <- tibble(names, rep(names)) %>%
  rename(
    giver = names,
    recipient = `rep(names)`
  )

sample(names$giver)

tibble(names, sample(names$giver)) %>%
  select(-giver) %>%
  rename(
  shuffle = `sample(names$giver)`
  )
```
